transition = 0
transvertion = 0
ratio = 0

dnaOne = ""
dnaTwo = ""
checkString = ""

dnaSequenceOne = list(dnaOne)
dnaSequenceTwo = list(dnaTwo)

transitionList = ["AG", "GA", "CT", "TC"]
transversionsList = ["AC", "CA", "AT", "TA", "CG", "GC", "GT", "TG"]

for p in zip(dnaSequenceOne,dnaSequenceTwo):
    checkString += p[0]
    checkString += p[1]

    if checkString in transversionsList:
        transvertion += 1

    if checkString in transitionList:
        transition += 1


    checkString = ""

ratio = transition / float(transvertion)

print ratio
